remarks: The values of two compositions of permutations are equal if the values of the composed permutations are pairwise equal.  (Contributed by AV, 26-Jan-2019.)
statement:

fvcosymgeq $p |- ( ( G e. B /\ K e. P ) -> ( ( X e. I /\ ( G ` X ) = ( K ` X ) /\ A. n e. I ( F ` n ) = ( H ` n ) ) -> ( ( F o. G ) ` X ) = ( ( H o. K ) ` X ) ) ) $.
